tool_description: Get the current latest price of gold and silver in US dollars per ounce.
name: Gold Price - Live
title: Gold Price - Live

api_list.name: Get Metal Prices
api_list.description:
Get the current latest metals price.
Including gold and silver.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gold-price-live.p.rapidapi.com/get_metal_prices"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gold-price-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gold-price-live.p.rapidapi.com/get_metal_prices"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gold-price-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
